messages:
You don't need to defend anymore, 
 because an obstacle has parked
 in front of your goal! 
 Isn't that amazing?

Your goal is to score as many goals as you can
 specifically, 10 or more!

You have 1:30, so you need to score 
 every 8 seconds to meet the target! 
 Sounds challenging? I believe you can do it!
Go ahead and conquer this challenge!
